' Used to send an email when someone posts a forum entry on the Projects site ' ' peter 05.02.2008 ' ' '=============================================================================== 'Me.dom.save(CCO.Server.MapPath("./logs/Forum.xml")) 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Start") Dim ProjectID As String = Me.getProperty("source_id","") If ProjectID="" Then 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Project ID") Return Me End If Dim Project As String = Me.getPropertyAttribute("source_id","keyed_name","") Dim Topic As String = Me.GetProperty("topic","") Dim Message As String = Me.GetProperty("message","") Dim Author As String = Me.getPropertyAttribute("author","keyed_name","") 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Author is " & Author) ' get the Owner of this project Dim ProjectItem = Me.newItem("CP_CommunityProject","get") ProjectItem.setID(ProjectID) ProjectItem.setAttribute("select","author(email)") ProjectItem = ProjectItem.apply() If ProjectItem.isError() Then 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Project Query Failed " & ProjectItem.getErrorDetail() ) Return Me End If Dim Owner = ProjectItem.getItemsByXPath("//Item[@type='Contact']") If Owner.getItemCount() < 1 Then Return Me Owner = Owner.getItemByIndex(0).getProperty("email","") If owner="" Then 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Contact item on CP_CommunityProject") Return Me End If 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Contact for Project is " & Owner) Dim email As New System.Net.Mail.MailMessage() email.From = New System.Net.Mail.MailAddress("community@aras.com") email.To.Add(Owner) email.Subject = "Community Project Forum Posting: " & Project email.isBodyHTML = True email.Body = "

Posting by: " & Author & "


The topic is: " & Topic & "


The Message is: " & Message & "

" cco.email.setup_smtpmail_server_and_send(email) Return Me
